com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware

Interface HardwareDevice

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BNO055IMU, ColorSensor, CRServo, DcMotor, DcMotorSimple, DistanceSensor, GyroSensor, Servo
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BNO055IMUImpl, CRServoImpl, DcMotorImpl, GyroSensorImpl, ServoImpl, VirtualRobotController.ColorSensorImpl, VirtualRobotController.DistanceSensorImpl

    public interface HardwareDevice
    Interface to represent any hardware device that can be managed by HardwareMap.
